predicate.note: Frames file for 'fluctuate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Butter my butt, it is in Verbnet! Entry 45.6 'calibratable causative'. Other framed members include appreciate decrease diminish plummet skyrocket tumble and probably others. Framenet entry Scalar Position 2. Comparison with tumble.

roleset.name: move randomly across some scale

example.name: arg2 as manner
example.text: Nashua's stock has fluctuated sharply on takeover speculation.

example.name: arg2 as extent
example.text: When the price of polyethylene moves a mere penny a pound, Quantum's annual profit fluctuates by about 85 cents a share, provided no other variables are changing.
example.arg: provided no other variables are changing

roleset.note: The difference is that EXT is numerical, while MNR can be just an adverb.

example.name: with range
example.text: Between then and his bid on Oct. 5, the price fluctuated between $75.625 and $87.375.

example.name: high and low
example.text: John's weight fluctuates from a low of 98 pounds to a high of 500.

roleset.note: This was way too much work for such a low-freq verb.
